messages.title: Straight talking
messages.content: Julie says, 'I am here to serve the community and as MP I will represent YOUR views.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Let's have schools parents want to send their children to
We must reopen local Post Offices closed by the EU

issues.brexitEurope: We must reopen local Post Offices closed by the EU
issues.education: Let's have schools parents want to send their children to

leaflet.personalStatement: Born and raised in West London, Julie Carter was educated at Southfield Primary School and Ealing Grammar School for Girls (now The Ellen Wilkinson School for Girls). She went on to earn a Bachelor of Arts at Middlesex University and CPE/LPC Law and solicitor's training at Ealing Law School, Thames Valley University.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG

images.caption: Julie Carter - Ealing Central and Acton

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by Paul Nuttall on behalf of the United Kingdom Independence Party, Lexdrum House, Unit 1, King Charles Business Park, Heathfield, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ12 6UT. Printed by Bishops Printers, Fitzherbert Road, Farlington, Portsmouth, Hampshire PO6 1RU
